name: Cockatrice
description: The Cockatrice has the wings of a bat, a body resembling a chicken, and a long, scaly tail.
memorable: Its ability to petrify prey with a single peck makes it highly dangerous despite its comical appearance.
goals: To ambush small prey or incapacitate larger creatures.
relations: Can be found in the company of smaller monstrous creatures or in areas with abundant prey.
strengths: Petrifying ability can incapacitate opponents for an extended duration.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and Hit Points make it vulnerable to sustained attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack that can inflict piercing damage and potentially petrify.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to petrify creatures with its bite attack, turning them into lifeless statues.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in dim light as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Average stealth and perception, allowing it to effectively hide and locate threats.
additional_information: Has a unique reaction ability called Frenzy, allowing counterattacks.
Resistant to exhaustion and the frightened condition due to Monstrosity Resilience.
Can emit a startling crow to impose disadvantage on attackers.
Capable of flying, providing strategic mobility.
Not particularly intelligent, limiting its tactical choices.
test_queries: small dragon-like creature that turns you to stone
dangerous flying creature that bites and petrifies
ambush predator found in swamps and caves
chicken-like monster with a scaly tail and deadly gaze
